title: scikits.learn is now part of pythonxy
description: The guys behind pythonxy have been kind enough to add the latest scikit-learn as an additional plugin for their distribution. Having scikit-learn being in both pythonxy and EPD will hopefully make it easier to use for Windows users. For now I will continue to make windows precompiled binaries, but pythonxy â€¦
